title: Diamond-Studded Bangles (Gaajulu) in 22K Gold
materials: brilliant-cut Diamonds (Vajraalu). The gold has a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for a long-lasting shine.
features: A pair of minimalist yet elegant bangles featuring a delicate line of individually set diamonds. The open-ended design allows for easy wear and a modern aesthetic, while the floral motifs embracing each diamond evoke traditional South Indian design sensibilities.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with dazzling white diamonds
creating a classic and timeless color combination.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranti and Diwali
or as a thoughtful gift for a loved one. Their subtle elegance makes them suitable for both traditional attire and modern outfits.
description: These bangles seamlessly blend contemporary design with the timeless appeal of gold and diamonds. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability, while the minimalist design offers versatility. A perfect heirloom piece (Sampada) that can be cherished for generations.
